name: Flying Toy Horror Hero Game
description:
Play our new action game with different superhero power skills, You have a different powers with no limit range. You have to fight with gangsters and save the city from bad guys, Be carefully use your skills and don't become any kind of gangster in this game, so if you do that the police, and cop forces will attack on you. and try to eliminate from this game. So you can't complete this game.You have different abilities to jump, get car, and other things from the NPC, with the help of jumps You have to sustain yourself in the game and complete the missions.

Features:
-Changing abilities
-High Quality Assets
-Amazing Sound Effects
-Customize gameplay controls.
